HEADLINE: MongoDB Stock Rockets 20% After Monster Q3 Earnings Beat
SUMMARY: MongoDB shares surged after reporting Q3 FY2025 revenue of $529M, up 22% YoY, exceeding guidance. Atlas grew 26% YoY with strong enterprise deals.

HEADLINE: MongoDB Raises FY25 Guidance on Strong Q3 Performance
SUMMARY: Following Q3 beat, MongoDB raised FY25 revenue guidance to $1.97-1.98B. Management cited strong AI application momentum on the platform.

HEADLINE: MongoDB CFO Michael Gordon to Depart After 10 Years
SUMMARY: MongoDB announced that CFO Michael Gordon will leave after nearly 10 years. Gordon led the companys successful IPO. Search for replacement underway.

HEADLINE: Elastic Q2 FY2025 Beats Estimates, Gen AI Commitments Double
SUMMARY: Elastic reported strong Q2 results with revenue up 18% YoY to $365M. Gen AI customer commitments almost doubled in dollar volume vs Q1.

HEADLINE: Elastic Raises FY25 Guidance Following Strong Q2
SUMMARY: Elastic raised full-year revenue guidance to $1.451-1.457B after Q2 beat. Cloud revenue grew 25% YoY, now 45% of total revenue.

HEADLINE: Snowflake Stock Surges 18% on Strong Q3 Results and AI Momentum
SUMMARY: Snowflake shares jumped after reporting Q3 FY2025 results that beat expectations. Product revenue grew 29% YoY to $900M, driven by strong AI adoption with over 3,200 accounts using Cortex AI features.

HEADLINE: Snowflake Raises FY25 Guidance After Q3 Beat
SUMMARY: Following strong Q3 results, Snowflake raised full-year product revenue guidance to $3.43B, up from prior $3.36B guidance, citing AI momentum.

HEADLINE: Elastic CFO Janesh Moorjani Departing After 7 Years
SUMMARY: Elastic announced CFO Janesh Moorjani is leaving. Eric Pringle, Group VP of Finance, appointed as Interim CFO effective December 14.

HEADLINE: Snowflake Announces Anthropic Partnership for Enterprise AI
SUMMARY: Snowflake partnered with Anthropic to bring Claude AI models to Snowflake Cortex, giving enterprises more choices for building AI applications.

HEADLINE: Datadog Q3 Earnings Beat: Revenue Up 26%, AI Native Customers Growing
SUMMARY: Datadog reported strong Q3 2024 results with revenue of $690M, up 26% YoY. AI native customers now represent 6% of ARR. Free cash flow margin reached 30%.

HEADLINE: Datadog Raises Full Year Guidance After Strong Q3
SUMMARY: Following Q3 beat, Datadog raised FY24 revenue guidance to $2.62-2.63B. Management highlighted strong adoption of new products including LLM Observability.

HEADLINE: Datadog Launches On-Call Product for Integrated Incident Management
SUMMARY: Datadog announced On-Call, a modern paging experience integrated directly into its observability platform, seeing strong early customer reception.

HEADLINE: Confluent Surpasses $1 Billion Revenue Run Rate
SUMMARY: Confluent reported Q3 2024 results with subscription revenue up 27% to $240M. Confluent Cloud grew 42% to $130M. Company achieved positive operating margin.

HEADLINE: Confluent Q3 Beats Expectations, Raises Full Year Guidance
SUMMARY: Confluent exceeded Q3 estimates and raised FY24 guidance. Management highlighted strong Flink adoption and expanding AI use cases driving demand.

HEADLINE: OpenAI Expands Use of Confluent for Real-Time Data Streaming
SUMMARY: OpenAI has expanded their use of Confluents data streaming platform to help scale with increased platform usage, validating data streaming in AI.
